p: With qYFV w the number of RNA copies in the analysed well and qYFV m the mean number of RNA copies in the negative control wells. Fifty percent neutralisation titre NT 50 values were determined from plots of per cent of viral neutralisation versus serum dilutions and calculated by non-linear regression (four-parameter doseâ€“response curve) analysis using Graphpad PRISM software (v7.00 for Windows, GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA, www.graphpad.com).
